description:
Jog, run, or sprint freely. Long sleeves are great for more coverage, but more material means longer drying times. Made from a breathable recycled poly blend, the Sprint Free long sleeve takes less than 6 minutes to feel dry against your skin, so no more compromises.

  • Breathable recycled polyester and spandex is made from 9 plastic bottles
  • 4-way stretch and hem side slides for unrestricted movement
  • Thumb loops at the cuff keep the sleeves from riding up and keep the back of your hand warm on chilly runs
  • Antimicrobial treatment resists odours
name: Brooks Sprint Free Long Sleeve 2.0 - Women's
